name: Interactive map tracking
tagline: A QGIS 2.6 plugin to track camera of user , AND/OR to autocommit/refresh edit on PostGIS vector layer
body:
Interactive Map Tracking is a QGIS >=2.6 plug-in.

Plugin : 
* [Website](http://remi-c.github.io/interactive_map_tracking/)
* [Wiki](https://github.com/Remi-C/interactive_map_tracking/wiki)
* [Bug tracker](https://github.com/Remi-C/interactive_map_tracking)

It was created by Lionel Atty (IGN) and Rémi Cura (IGN/Thales)

Lionel worked on the technical aspects :
 - architecture/design
 - all the code !
 - debug/low level doc

Rémi worked on usability 
 - concept
 - test
 - high level doc (wiki,site)

Any contribution to the project is very welcome (GPL)

03/2015
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
